sentence.text: Mutations in anterograde neuronal dense core vesicle transport are responsible for autosomal recessive spastic paraplegia type 58 (anterograde neuronal dense core vesicle transport) and spastic ataxia 2 (anterograde neuronal dense core vesicle transport).

entity.text: anterograde neuronal dense core vesicle transport
anterograde neuronal dense core vesicle transport
anterograde neuronal dense core vesicle transport

sentence.text: We can now report that progressive ataxia of Charolais cattle results from a homozygous single nucleotide polymorphism in the coding region of the anterograde neuronal dense core vesicle transport gene.

entity.text: anterograde neuronal dense core vesicle transport
